tool_description: API that return the number of appearance of a string in a string
name: Number of Appearance
title: Number of Appearance

api_list.name: default
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://number-of-appearance.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "number-of-appearance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://number-of-appearance.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "number-of-appearance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
